title: Fool's Journey (The War of the Tarot, Book One): A Supernatural Urban Fantasy
description: There are some days when you realize you should have checked your horoscope before you answered the door. But there are far worse things than letting a little action and mystery into your life.  When women who bear a strong resemblance to herself start dying left and right, local psychic and magic dabbler Kassidy Hawthorn sets out to stop the killer. But will she succeed when she finds herself hunted by an array of supernatural monsters, a charming evil god, a mysterious cult of moon worshippers, and the police?  Join her as she traverses the urban world of swords, sorcery, and gods to find out.  Word Count 12,428
author: Brandon Tackett
